word:
(929)                     June 18, 1911. -5- MS. 9-1911. 

     Remarks of Mrs. E.G. White Regarding Aggressive Moves at 
                          Loma Linda 
           At a Meeting in the Chapel, April 20, 1911. 


     (Thursday afternoon, April 20, there was a council meeting in the Loma Linda Chapel, to consider the opportunity that had just been presented to purchase from Mr. Kelly a tract of land west of the Pepper Drive and south of the Colton road, consisting of about eighty-four acres.
